tool_description: Our Watch Models API is a comprehensive and accurate data source of more than 20,000 watch models. This API allows users to retrieve detailed information about each model, including brand, model name, release date, features, and more. This data can be easily integrated into a wide range of use cases, such as e-commerce, watch retailers, watch collectors, research and development, and watch repair. Our API is constantly updated and maintained to ensure that the data provided is accurate and comprehensive.

api_list.name: Get Media Links
api_list.description: Retrieves media links associated with a specific watch model using its ID.

required_parameters.name: watchId
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the watch model.

api_list.name: Get Watches By Brand Family Model
api_list.description: Retrieves all watches that match the specified brand, family, and model.

required_parameters.name: brandName
required_parameters.description: The name of the watch brand.

required_parameters.name: model
required_parameters.description: The specific model of the watch.

required_parameters.name: family
required_parameters.description: The family category of the watch.

api_list.name: Get All Models By Brand And Family
api_list.description: Retrieves all models available under a specific brand and family.

required_parameters.name: family
required_parameters.description: The family category of the watches.

required_parameters.name: brandName
required_parameters.description: The name of the watch brand.

api_list.name: Get All Family By Brand name
api_list.description: Retrieves all family categories available for a specific brand.

required_parameters.name: brandName
required_parameters.description: The name of the watch brand.

api_list.name: Get All Brands
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of all watch brands available in the database.
